reviewtext: P-Touch Labelers are handy little gadgets that should be in every household. There are all sorts of things that need labels. If you have a P-Touch you will discover the hundreds of things that you never realized would be ever so much better with a label. This black-on-white tape for the P-Touch is the basic label tape that the machine needs to be useful. The tape makes high quality durable glossy labels and works perfectly in the P-Touch machine.
summary: Standard Tape for P-Touch: Works Great
